intro: Pellionia mindanaensis, commonly known as Mindanao Pellionia, is a flowering plant native to the Philippines. It belongs to the family Urticaceae, which includes nettle and related plants. The plant is characterized by its small, heart-shaped leaves and clusters of tiny white flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments, typically found in forest understories. Its ornamental value makes it a sought-after plant in horticulture.
